5D45F11D.Line1.D5166: Bandits are a constant in the southern desert, but some have grown brazen of late. Attacking our patrols within sight of the oasis.

CC4F574A.VoiceDir1.D5166: Gruff. Weary. Haddad is an old veteran Iron Wolf.

F73A6A9F.Line3.D5166: I need every able body watching our perimeter, not running off to get themselves killed.
